changeLog:
New Version Updates:
• Autumn Sale: Limited Time Offer!​
• Added 3 new filters: G3 Green, G3 Amber, Ekt100
• Optimization of the two G2 filters and HDF filter
• Added Exif information to photos
• UI optimization
• Supports importing photos in HEIF/HEIC format
• iOS26 bug fixes

changeLogMultiLang.en:
New version updates:
• Added 4 new filters
• Livephoto shooting support
• Multiple exposure support
• Real-time preview support
• UI optimization
changeLogMultiLang.zh-CN:
新版本更新内容:
• 新增4款滤镜
• 支持livephoto拍摄
• 支持多重曝光
• 支持实时预览
• UI优化
